title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Developed a modular Autonomous Lead Generation AI on a Linux VPS, integrating multi-source scraping (Google Maps, Yelp), AI-based verification (GPT-5 Nano), and automated enrichment (Apollo.io) to push high-quality leads directly into Zoho CRM.

Architected and deployed an intelligent invoice processing system using n8n and Google Gemini, automating data extraction from unstructured PDF/image invoices and syncing structured financial records to Airtable for real-time approval workflows.

Engineered a scalable backend microservice in Go (Gin) for a TikTok-like influencer application, implementing modules for JWT authentication, S3 storage, and user engagement using a PostgreSQL database.

Architected a full-stack AI ecosystem on Google Cloud (Firebase Gen 2, Firestore), featuring a modular Python ETL pipeline to ingest and vectorize content (YouTube, Wistia, Ghost) into Pinecone, and a Serverless RAG Backend utilizing GPT-4.1 for intelligent chat, JIT video analysis, and real-time PDF intelligence.
Developed the backend MVP for an AI-powered supplier quote system using NestJS, MongoDB, and OpenAI, integrating the Gmail API (OAuth) for sending customized, templated emails.
Architected a solution to integrate a Next.js and GraphQL-based AI web app (Vetsie AI) with a WordPress membership system, restricting application access exclusively to paying subscribers.

Engineered an enterprise-grade financial platform using NestJS, MySQL (TypeORM), and Docker. Built a resilient dual-sync engine for Xero General Ledger data featuring self-healing OAuth2 authentication, advanced rate limiting with exponential backoff, and real-time reporting (Aged Debtors, Cash Flow) via automated Cron jobs.
Created and deployed automated workflows using n8n and Make.com to scrape, clean, and process web data, leveraging Gemini and OpenAI for data enrichment and automated email processing.

Designed and published 'ContextCrafter', a CLI tool (NPM) for preparing large codebases for LLM context windows, featuring intelligent aggregation, custom ignore logic (.contextignore), and architectural tree generation.

Designed and deployed a production-grade AI-to-Human contact center platform using FreeSWITCH, Docker, and React. Implemented real-time SIP/WebRTC call bridging, intelligent agent routing with barge-in capabilities, and a Python (FastAPI/Redis) backend for event-driven call state management.

title: Freelance Backend & AI Developer
responsibilities: Developed and deployed custom Python backends for AI/ML applications, including computer vision and process automation.
Co-developed 'Scam Eye,' a spam detection tool utilizing custom-trained models and OpenAI LLMs.
Built and integrated Node.js (Express) backends with payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal) and third-party APIs (Twilio).
